<h2>Militarización, militarismo y corrupción</h2>

<h3><span style='color:#4f4f4f'>[Militarization, Militarism and Corruption]</span></h3>
 

* This chapter analyzes the opinion of Mexicans regarding the growing participation of the military in civilian tasks and the effects on the level of corruption.
* It was found that a significant portion of the population perceives the military as one of the least corrupt institutions, leading to high support for militarization policies. However, this has not been due to the lesser perception of corruption in projects led by the army.
* To obtain these results, a face-to-face survey of 1,500 people was designed, conducted, and analyzed.
